SELECT O.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACCOMM_REVIEW WHERE MEM_NO = #{ memNo } AND ORDER_NO = orderNo) count FROM ( SELECT R.ORDER_NO orderNo ,TO_CHAR(R.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate ,TO_CHAR(R.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate ,R.PRICE price ,A.ACCOMM_NO accommNo ,ROOM_NO roomNo ,TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') paymentDate ,R.STATUS status ,A.ACCOMM_NAME accName ,A.CATEGORY category
FROM ROOM_PAYMENT R JOIN ACCOMM A ON(A.ACCOMM_NO=R.ACCOMM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = #{ memNo } ORDER BY paymentDate DESC) O

SELECT DISTINCT O.* ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACTIVITY_REVIEW WHERE MEM_NO = #{ memNo } AND ORDER_NO = orderNo) count , (SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) FROM TICKET_PAYMENT WHERE ORDER_NO = orderNo) ticketSum FROM ( SELECT T.ORDER_NO orderNo ,A.ACTIVITY_NO activityNo ,TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') paymentDate ,T.STATUS status ,A.ACTIVITY_NAME activityName FROM TICKET_PAYMENT "T" JOIN TICKET TI ON(TI.TICKET_NO = T.TICKET_NO) JOIN ACTIVITY "A" ON(A.ACTIVITY_NO=TI.ACTIVITY_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = #{ memNo } ORDER BY paymentDate DESC) O

SELECT A.ACCOMM_NO accommNo , A.ACCOMM_NAME accName , TRUNC(RP.START_DATE-SYSDATE) dday , RP.ORDER_NO orderNo , R.ROOM_NAME roomName , TO_CHAR(RP.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate , TO_CHAR(RP.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') endDate , M.MEM_NAME memName , M.PHONE phone , M.EMAIL email , RP.PRICE price , TO_CHAR(RP.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') paymentDate FROM MEMBER M JOIN ROOM_PAYMENT RP ON(M.MEM_NO=RP.MEM_NO) JOIN ROOM R ON(RP.ROOM_NO=R.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOMM A ON(R.ACCOMM_NO = A.ACCOMM_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo }

SELECT DISTINCT A.ACTIVITY_NO activityNo , ACTIVITY_NAME activityName , ORDER_NO orderNo , (WITH TIC AS ( SELECT TICKET_NAME ticketName FROM TICKET JOIN TICKET_PAYMENT USING(TICKET_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO =#{ orderNo } ) SELECT LISTAGG(ticketName, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ticketName) FROM TIC)ticketName , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TICKET JOIN TICKET_PAYMENT USING(TICKET_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo }) count , M.MEM_NAME memName , M.PHONE phone , M.EMAIL email , (SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) FROM TICKET_PAYMENT WHERE ORDER_NO =#{ orderNo }) ticketSum , TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') paymentDate FROM MEMBER M JOIN TICKET_PAYMENT TP ON(M.MEM_NO=TP.MEM_NO) JOIN TICKET T ON(TP.TICKET_NO=T.TICKET_NO) JOIN ACTIVITY A ON(T.ACTIVITY_NO = A.ACTIVITY_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo }

SELECT A.*, (SELECT ROOM_NAME FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_NO = roomNo)roomName FROM( SELECT DISTINCT REVIEW_NO reviewNo ,ACCOMM_NAME accommName ,MEM_NO memNo ,AR.ROOM_NO roomNo ,REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent ,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') createDate ,TAG tag ,STAR star ,FILE_PATH filePath ,ORIGIN_NAME originName FROM ACCOMM_REVIEW AR JOIN ACCOMM A USING(ACCOMM_NO) JOIN ROOM R USING(ACCOMM_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo }) A

SELECT A.*, (WITH TIC AS ( SELECT TICKET_NAME ticketName FROM TICKET JOIN TICKET_PAYMENT USING(TICKET_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo } ) SELECT LISTAGG(ticketName, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ticketName) FROM TIC)ticketName FROM( SELECT DISTINCT REVIEW_NO reviewNo ,ACTIVITY_NAME activityName ,MEM_NO memNo ,REVIEW_CONTENT reviewContent ,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD') createDate ,TAG tag ,STAR star ,FILE_PATH filePath ,ORIGIN_NAME originName FROM ACTIVITY_REVIEW AR JOIN ACTIVITY A USING(ACTIVITY_NO) JOIN TICKET T USING(ACTIVITY_NO) WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ orderNo }) A
